website_summaries.verdict: This versatile rubber mallet is light enough for tile work but heavy enough for metal work.
pros: At 12 ounces, this model can do the light work of tile tapping without causing damage, while the sturdy rubber face can also manage the work of shaping metal
The solid hickory handle stands up to a big workload without showing signs of wear
cons: The handle is thick and does not include a comfort grip, which may strain users' hands with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for large or small hands
customer_reviews.text: Made in the usa was what I wanted. When I received this mallet, sooner than expected, I found it very comfortable to grasp even with my smaller sized female hands. Love that. Can grip up further on the handle or back at end for larger hands. Very sturdy and not too heavy. Love this mallet. Will be used primarily to seal tops on food buckets so I do not crack them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This mallet is a bit odd, doesn't feel like it was worth the money. Handle's thicker than comfortable and, as a concerning sign of the manufacturer's lack of care, there's a length of rough bare wood under the head of the mallet. The hit lands nicely, doesn't bounce, but I'm going to be looking for another, better mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Bigpurplebarn

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 30 Days.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to write negative reviews but this one was pretty blatant. I was very careful not to use this mallet on anything other than Real Estate signs. Also, I’m not a bruiser or UFC fighter and probably don’t have the swinging power to break a solid tool like this. It happened within a month or purchase after using on five or six signs. Maybe I just got the bad egg of the bunch...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mallet
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap rubber mallet before it was stolen. The thief did me a favor. This mallet is awesome. Unlike the cheap mallet this one is a dead blow and doesn’t bounce back. USA made so my purchase put another American to work. Great product and American money going towards American workers. Sounds like a winner to me.
customer_reviews.author: SavingsShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Mallet
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller rubber mallet that I have used for many years and this one is much better. I like the larger size that will require less ponding to get the job done. The quality is also excellent. I love that it’s Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only issue is the bottom of the handle has a tiny fracture and is starting to splinter. I may have to sand it off/down. Beyond that its nice. I used it once for 10 minutes hammering plastic steaks into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fuentez

customer_reviews.title: IT IS FOR HITTING STUFF AND THINGS!
customer_reviews.text: MADE IN AMERICA *Eagle screechs* *Marine blast M2* *Firefighter puts out fire with American pride. Made well bought another one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: TheCrowHouse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hammer, significantly less denting than other cheap hammers that I have tried before. Love that this hammer does not have chemicals or California warning labels about reproductive harm or giving potential cancer. Will buy again in the future to have more on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this even if you don’t realize it.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have around. We keep one at the house and one in storage rooms. A great tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Estwing seems to be a notch above the competition. Well Made
customer_reviews.author: Compassion13

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Use and Easy to Hold
customer_reviews.text: Who can live without a mallet?! Multipurpose use for home and art projects.
customer_reviews.author: LJD

customer_reviews.title: Great Mallet
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy 1st class mallet head with a 1st class with a handle
customer_reviews.author: maggie l

customer_reviews.title: Mallet time.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good mallet. Made in the USA is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: was just as I ordered and delivered on time. worked perfectly. Thanks much Bob
customer_reviews.text: was just as I ordered and delivered on time. worked perfectly. Thanks much Bob
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Good rubber mallet
customer_reviews.text: As expected from Estwing, it is a quality tool. Good job guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jared N

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on smashing
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic rubber mallet. Sturdy wood handle. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Wee

product_meta.title: Estwing Deadhead Rubber Mallet - 12 oz Soft-Face Hammer with Bounce Resistant Head & Hickory Wood Handle - DH-12
product_meta.description: Size:12 oz (Ounces)Estwing's 12 oz. Deadhead Rubber Mallet comes with a hickory (Carya) handle to create an all-around, premium quality tool. The hickory handle is extremely hard, dense and shock resistant, while the rubber head offers sturdy control, accurate strikes and great results. This rubber mallet is also bounce resistant and features a 2.3 in. face diameter with a head length of 4-1/4 in., the perfect tool for safely smoothing while protecting your finishing surfaces.
feature_bullets: FEATURES DEADHEAD TECHNOLOGY – Reduces bounce and enhances control
SURFACE PROTECTION – Premium rubber head helps to eliminate damage to your striking surface
MULTI-USE MALLET – Use for sheet metal forming, upholstery work, tile setting, laminate flooring installs & more
GENUINE HICKORY HANDLE – Designed to fit the grip of the user’s hand ensuring comfort & control
MADE IN THE USA – Our American made tools are proudly crafted Rockford, IL

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars32 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
